title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When performing a 'copy package' operation in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui, the destination is incorrectly shown as xxx instead of org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.
OB: The 'copy package' operation shows xxx as the destination instead of org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.
EB: The 'copy package' operation should show org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui as the destination.
SR:
1. Open org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.
2. Select the 'copy package' option.
3. Verify that the destination is shown as xxx instead of org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.
